about_the_game:
"Nothing is left behind in this world."

The story of a mysterious boy who wears a gas mask and a girl.

A world transformed by strange creatures.

What awaits them where they will end up...

・2D side-scrolling

・Collecting and crafting materials.

・Fight against those who sometimes confront you.

・Explore the world through flavor text.

・Explore the world through the flavor text.

The trial version is as follows

・It is not possible to restart the game from the beginning after clearing the game.

(Deletion of game data is allowed. (You can delete the game data and continue the game from the last auto-save)

・Demonstration only for the demo version

(Opening and ending are exclusive to the demo version.)

・Bugs and other problems may occur.

・The contents of the demo version are different from those of the main game.

・The application will be forced to close after the game is cleared.

Regarding the distribution of the game

Distribution without permission is allowed for both individuals and corporations.

Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.

We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of the video and distribution, and the link to the Steam page in the summary section.

This game includes forced termination of the application, bloodshed, etc. Please take this into consideration when distributing the game.

Please take this into consideration when distributing this game.

We are not responsible for any damage caused by the distribution of this game.

We are not responsible for any damage caused by distributing videos of this game.

The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Translated with (free version)

The story of a mysterious boy who wears a gas mask and a girl.

What awaits them where they will end up...

・2D side-scrolling

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U (2 * 1800) or equivalent; Intel Core i5-2400S (4 * 2500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or equivalent; Radeon HD 6750M (512 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

name: RaidKids Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
